```py
>>> d = {'a': 1, 'b': 2, 'c': 3}
>>> ser = pd.Series(data=d, index=['a', 'b', 'c'])
>>> ser
a   1
b   2
c   3
dtype: int64 
```

```py
>>> d = {'a': 1, 'b': 2, 'c': 3}
>>> ser = pd.Series(data=d, index=['x', 'y', 'z'])
>>> ser
x   NaN
y   NaN
z   NaN
dtype: float64 
```

```py
>>> r = [1, 2]
>>> ser = pd.Series(r, copy=False)
>>> ser.iloc[0] = 999
>>> r
[1, 2]
>>> ser
0    999
1      2
dtype: int64 
```

```py
>>> r = np.array([1, 2])
>>> ser = pd.Series(r, copy=False)
>>> ser.iloc[0] = 999
>>> r
array([999,   2])
>>> ser
0    999
1      2
dtype: int64 
```
